participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Emma is a creative and sensitive individual who enjoys the tranquility of her pet fish. She's navigating the complexities of young adulthood and recent heartbreak.
participant_1.background: i've a pet fish. i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago. i turned 18 years old yesterday. my favorite color is orange.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is adventurous and laid-back, always looking for new challenges on his skateboard. He values friendship and enjoys being part of a community of fellow skaters.
participant_2.background: i'm a skateboarder. i am always wearing a hat. my favourite skater is rob dryden. my friends are all skateboarders.
